article:
Jack is an 7-year-old boy He lives in London. His father has a shop there and his mother works in a hospital .She is _ to others. So all the people like her.Jack _ to go to school this autumn. It's a little far from their home and his father takes _ to school by car on _ . So he is _ late for class and all his teachers like him.
It's Monday today. Miss Green is _ them to count from one to ten. Jack is studying hard. Soon he can count them. Miss Green is happy and asks, " How many _ are there in your family, Jack?"  Jack stands up and says, " _ Miss Green." " Oh ? " Miss Green is surprised, She says, "There are three people in your family, your father ,your mother and you "
" _ now I'm not at home. I'm at school, you know!" Jack answers
